extendedInfo.description: Deep  Slumber  Audio  Suite  1  -  Easy  Sleep  Enhancement  for  Better  Rest  -    Powered  by    PsimatiXâ¢  proprietary  brainwave  audio  technology.  Created  by  internationally  recognized  brainwave  audio  entrainment  expert  Leigh  Spusta,  this  app  has  been  specifically  arranged  to  provide  a  very  simple  way  to  help  you  to  fall  asleep  easily  and  get  the  rest  you  need. It  is  a  proven  fact  that  getting  enough  quality  sleep  is  absolutely  essential  for  your  physical,  mental,  and  emotional  well  being.  Some  of  us  have  occasions  of  restlessness,  and  still  others  of  us  suffer  a  more  chronic  lack  of  sleep.  One  very  effective,  safe,  and  natural  method  to  aid  in  getting  to  sleep  is  audio  entrainment  technology. This  collection  was  created  to  assist  you  in  falling  asleep  quickly  and  easily  by  bringing  your  body  into  deep  physical  relaxation,  and  completely  calming  your  mind,  entering  into  a  dreamy  feeling  that  leads  naturally  into  peacful,  restful  sleep.  Targets  a  low  alpha  and  theta  brainwave  state  by  Utilizing  PsimatiXâ¢  proprietary  audio  technology.  These  tracks  can  also  be  used  for  self  hypnosis,  meditation,  and  to  unwind  and  de-stress.  Do  not  drive  or  operate  any  machinery  while  using  this  application. This app uses a 3G or wifi connection.Leigh  Spusta  is  a  behavioral  scientist,  hypnotherapist,  and  Certified  Therapeutic  Imagery  Facilitator  specializing  in  the  use  of  sound  frequencies  to  produce  deep,  relaxing  trance  states.  He  has  worked  with  several  therapists  in  Los  Angeles,  producing  a  variety  of  therapeutic  audio  cds.  Leigh  combines  his  talents  as  a  musician  and  his  knowledge  of  hypnosis  and  related  states,  in  an  effort  to  pioneer  new  approaches  in  creating  rich,  resonant  sound-scapes  for  greater  efficacy  in  healing  and  meditative  products.
